Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: Egg shaped UFO in a V-form flew over.
trends: There have been 29 other sightings in Levittown
There were no other sightings in Levittown on or around April 24th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsEgg shaped UFO in a V-form flew over as the witness was out on his deck smoking a cigar. The craft was flying flat & straight. It stopped and did not twist or tilt and came straight down like an elevator. It stopped below the clouds for a second and flew off. The craft was a steady white light which was real bright. The witness' deck is on the 2nd floor of an apartment in a complex that faces the Target Retail store's parking lot that is beyond the old Don Pablos Restaurant site.
